title: Introduction to Coding
description: Learn the fundamentals of coding in this amazing workshop

title: Free Painting
description: Have fun making your own painting! You will get to choose from different designs, sketches and resources to help you decide.

title: Get Fit - Boxing for Girls
description: During this 2-hour interactive workshop, youâ€™ll develop new fighting skills and get personal feedback on your boxing technique.

title: Careers in Finance
description: Learn more about the different careers available in the finance world by hearing from people in the industry.

title: Get into Teaching
description: If you want to get into teaching, we can help. Get information on training courses, funding, pay scales and tips on how to make a great application.

title: Music Production
description: Our music production courses will be taught using Ableton Live, Logic Pro X, Native Instruments and Pro Tools with students learning all aspects of music production including mixing, mastering, sound design and more.

title: Cake Baking and Decorating
description: Inspired by the Great British Bake-off? Find your inner Mary Berry on our short cake decorating or baking courses.

title: Get Employed - CV writing workshop
description: Looking for a job? We can help. Join us in our one day course to find out how you can writing a winning CV

title: Creative writing
description: Tell the story you want to tell in an engaging and informative way, we can teach you.

title: Film making
description: Covering all the basics you need to get started: from setting up a camera, to developing a narrative, lighting scenes, recording audio and editing, our film course will encourage you to explore both the creative and technical elements of making your own films.
